Art for Cliamte Justice

Our Favorite Projects

Our Philosophy and Design Services

Our Philosophy

We belive that our planet's climate is at a tipping point and unless we act imediately we will not have a livable future. Our mission is to help you group make beuatiful art to illuminate the need to promote climate justice.

Our Design Services

We are a group of three dedicated artists with over 25 years of experience making protest art. We can come up with custom designs for you from scratch or work with your vision to make a plan. Read on to learn more.

Graphic Design

We can develop digital designs for your project vision in house. We can also work with designs you come up with. At the end of the day we have you covered in the design department.

Custom Banners

We are good at making custom banners. We can make banners up to sixty feet long and fourty feet wide. Our banners start off as a digital design and then we draw and paint by hand.

Art Builds

One of our favorite projects is planning and hosting art builds for other groups. We will work with you to come up with a vision for the build and then we will teach you how to make it.

Silk Screening

We offer silk screening services. We can design and make custom silk screens for your project needs. The materials we can work with include polyester blends and cotton.
